<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dyslexia in the foreign language classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dyslexia im Fremdspracheklassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dyslexie dans la salle de classe de langue 
étrangère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dyslexia na sala de aula da língua extrangeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dyslexia nell'aula di lingua straniera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυσλεξία στην τάξη ξένης γλώσσας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dyslexia en la sala de clase del idioma 
extranjero</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a practical guide for teachers with strategies for teaching students with dyslexia and other learing disabilities in their classroom</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dyslexia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine praktische Anleitung für Lehrer 
mit Strategien für unterrichtende Kursteilnehmer mit dyslexia und 
anderer learing Unfähigkeit in ihrem Klassenzimmer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un guide pratique pour des professeurs avec
des stratégies pour les étudiants d'enseignement avec la dyslexie 
et d'autres incapacités learing dans leur salle de classe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma guia prática para professores com 
estratégias para estudantes ensinando com dyslexia e outras 
inabilidades learing em sua sala de aula</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida pratica per gli insegnanti con 
le strategie per gli allievi d'istruzione con il dyslexia ed altre 
inabilità learing nella loro aula</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας πρακτικός οδηγός για τους δασκάλους 
με τις στρατηγικές για τους σπουδαστές με τη δυσλεξία και άλλες 
learing ειδικές ανάγκες στην τάξη τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía práctica para los profesores 
con las estrategias para los estudiantes de enseñanza con dyslexia y 
otras inhabilidades learing en su sala de clase</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dyslexia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dyslexie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dyslexia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dyslexia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δυσλεξία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dyslexia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
